timeline.message: ProLogWindow simplifications, inline variables, dispose call and initialize method

Simplify, remove 'level' parameter logging in ProLogUI message append, used only in error
logging and does not matter relative to any error.

timeline.bodyText: Site-Note: I'd agree that this is bad, but I'd really let any exception propagate in this case 🤷
timeline.author: RoiEXLab
